      • ParticleSystem

        public ParticleSystem(int type,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Camera camera)
        Constructor that create a particle system
        Parameters:
        type - Particles type (Halo, Texture, No texture) ParticleType
        world - If `null` collisions between particles and world's objects are deactivated
        camera - For display particles on the screen

      • setParticlesPosition

        public void setParticlesPosition(float x,
                                 float y)
        Set the first position of particles. If you modify this, it won't affect existing particles but futures.
        Parameters:
        x - Set x position of futures particles
        y - Set y position of futures particles
